commit.message:
Rollup merge of #44116 - alexcrichton:update-libc, r=Mark-Simulacrum

Update the libc submodule

Brings in a few fixes for wasm/asmjs

files.patch:

                                        target_arch = "arm",
                                        target_arch = "powerpc",
                                        target_arch = "powerpc64",

           all(target_os = "fuchsia", target_arch = "aarch64")))]
